segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene, quite a vivid one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actively running from the faucet, which seems to be full on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is completely overflowing, a continuous sheet of water pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s already created a significant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands right there, seemingly oblivious to the flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s drying a plate with a dish towel, her gaze fixed entirely on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally in the growing puddle, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how absorbed she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage this will cause to the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is quickly becoming a hazardous slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would tell her what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel her foot getting wet?
segments.speaker: PAR
